extendedInfo.description: The original version of the popular urban meditation app for modern life. Practical, playful and beautifully-designed, buddhify increases your wellbeing by teaching you mindfulness-based meditation on the go. So whether youâre walking, on the train, at the gym or at home, buddhify trains your mind in a way that works for you. With more and more evidence that it can reduce stress and improve wellbeing, there has never been more interest in mindfulness and meditation. However even if you want to try it out, most people donât have that much spare time, think meditation is a bit too hippy or donât know where to start. buddhify solves all this. So if you ever thought meditation was not for you, this is the app that will change your mind. buddhify is designed to improve the following qualities in your mind: mindfulness, curiosity, energy, joy, calm, concentration and balance. Sound good? Features: â 32 custom-written urban meditation tracks â Choice of locations: Travelling, walking, at the gym and home â Four styles or flavours of meditation â Two lengths of meditation: bitesize (3mins) and regular (10mins) â Male or female voice options â Check-in system allows you to measure how youâre doing â Dashboard showing your usage and progress â Innovative Two Player Meditation mode buddhify is a ground-breaking app which presents meditation in a fun, accessible and effective way. Improve your wellbeing all for the price of a cup of coffee. Purchase this app today!PLEASE NOTE that the app closes when the screen is locked with the app in the background.  If you want to save battery live and lock your screen while using buddhify please just click Home + Power rather than just Power.  Thank you :)

reviews.title: Not bad, but far from great
reviews.comment: The actual audio clips are great. But it could be much much better if it were a native app rather than a port of the iPhone app. Also the ability to pre-download all the audio data would be great, rather than having to get it every time you want to listen..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A well done app!
reviews.comment: The app has many different settings to tailor you meditation. WELL WORTH THE MONEY!.
reviews.author: Robb Hindle

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it. Struggle with anxiety and depression and helps keep me focused. Do one before bed every night
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good enough
reviews.comment: Ui is out right broken + Cant turn screen off while listening.  Downloading of tracks should be done before getting out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Native/save battery
reviews.comment: Great audio. And I agree with the comment above, would be great to be a native android app! Also the ability to turn screen off whilst listening to audio to save battery. Thank you
reviews.author: prana sky

reviews.title: First impressions
reviews.comment: I like the concept. I have some meditation experience at Buddhist meditation retreats.   Following is the list of must have  improvements: - the total play time must be displayed on flavour and confirm screen - the timer count down must be displayed on the in progress screen - add simple, light, portrait  android UI. Without this, it feels odd, out of place.   I need to know upfront how much time I need or remaining before making a decision to stay put or not.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: \342\230\205 Definitely recommended! \'Meditation on the go\' sounds like an oxymoron but this app really relaxes me. I also use these techniques to help my deep meditation. \342\230\205
reviews.author: Dawn Hunter

reviews.title: Awsome.
reviews.comment: Awsome. But the soundfiles are quite large. A function to remind me to meditate would make it a fivestar app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent application.
reviews.comment: The meditation guides are nice. They are easy to use on the run which is a must. The interface is easy to use but it\'s not Android like: only reason this is not a 5 stars app (check Google GUI recommendations). Only other thing I would ask is a sleep time meditation. Buy it, you will be amazed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use it all the time
reviews.comment: Would like to see a night time relaxing meditation added though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meditate where & whenever!
reviews.comment: Has kept me relaxed and focused throughout the day!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the concept but falls short
reviews.comment: I absolutely love the idea of tailoring meditations to the context of real life. But how can you use the traveling meditation if you\'re in a subway tunnel and the app has no offline option? That\'s HUGE to me, I thought surely this would have that option. The landscape-only display is annoying but not a deal breaker. The stopping once your screen turns off is extremely frustrating, only just today did I see the comment about the work around. So, 3 stars for now, this app still needs work.
reviews.author: Laura Davis-Robeson \342\223\213

reviews.title: Good mp3s bad app
reviews.comment: At best this is a poor ios port. I recommend downloading the mp3s thru the app and uninstalling. The app seems to be a practice in patience more than the meditations
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quite Satisfied
reviews.comment: This app does a very good job at focusing beginning meditators on the mindset they must have when meditating, and reminds those with meditative experience that they can mix meditation with work and play. It incorporates many of the Buddha\'s central teachings into a simple and easy-to-grasp way. High quality and well worth the menial price-tag.
reviews.author: matthew nunn

reviews.title: Terrible flaws in the app
reviews.comment: The idea for the app and content are good, very good. Unfortunately major design flaws make it unusable. It works only in one position in the landscape mode.  The screen cannot be locked while playing (it causes app to quit!). Needs to be fixed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Umm
reviews.comment: Sorry I purchased this. Audio recordings of people moderating meditations. I dont like the stylebof the moderations either. Could easily use YouTube or another service for free.
reviews.author: Vince Canger

reviews.title: Really beautiful content, UI needs a bit of polish
reviews.comment: I absolutely love the content, really nice and heartwarming exercises without any religious baggage. It\'s a pity that the UI is just a straight iPhone adaptation without making it work nice on Android. A few days of developer time would make it perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Much better than before, but still needs polish
reviews.comment: This makes meditation easy for the average person on the go. Really helps relax me and help increase my focus wherever I am or on whatever I\'m doing.  Only thing I would say is that the UI could use a little more polish to be perfect. It really does feel a lot like a copy and paste iOS port. I think more attention should be put into the finer details behind Android\'s UI to make it look and operate more like a native app.  Also, this might differ by phone, but I wish there was a way to choose whether to put the MP3s into the internal storage or SD card.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The very first time....
reviews.comment: I used this, I relaxed for five hours and even though I still had insomnia that night, I didn\'t become frustrated, upset, irritated, or anything other than contemplative.    I might not have been RESTED the next morning, but I still was relaxed and not the least bit perturbed or rushed.  I\'ve definitely tried to make this a habit since then.
reviews.author: Nicole Moore

reviews.title: If I hadn\'t paid for it, I would have deleted it
reviews.comment: Deeply disappointed by this  app. Interface is still shoddy, sound is subpar, no way to tell what\'s been downloaded, app closes when screen turns off --- and no updates to fix any of these issues???
reviews.author: A Google User
